headline: Assurant Earns Feefo’s Platinum Trusted Service Award for 2026 in New Zealand
summary: AUCKLAND, New Zealand, February 18, 2026--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced it has received the Feefo Platinum Trusted Service Award, an exclusive recognition for businesses that consistently deliver world-class customer experiences year after year.
